text: Ana nera azerite'za keagare avre'za vu'nazanagi, keaga'a refkohu so'e hu'za onke'za frigahie hu'za hu'naze. Hagi iza huama huno ana nekura ama naga nofipinti eforera hu'ne hunora hugahie? Ana hu'neankino nagri vahe'mota ke ontahi kumi tamavutamava zamofo nona'a agri agofetu erinte'za sefura nemi'za, ama mopafintira ame hu'za azeri atre'naze.
